Appropriateness.Feedback: My students are graduate students, they need to learn more systematic way, including problem solving, knowledge/reasoning/planning/uncertain knowledge, machine learning, communicating/perceiving/acting, etc.

Accessibility.Feedback: No need to have a hardware

Alignment.Feedback: No clear learning objectives outline in each chapter

Appropriateness.Feedback: Too broad in the introduction, should be specific, using examples and analysis

Accuracy.Feedback: AI tools is not TensorFlow/Keras/PyTorch, this is too narrow

Alignment.Feedback: Still have some Latex code in the scripts

Clarity.Feedback: No clarification of why some choices are not correct

Variety.Feedback: Only multi-choice questions, could have more formats of questions

Alignment.Feedback: Learning objectives in general does not match with my teaching audience and is not technical, should be technical
